summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of First Avenue Northeast, in the City of Seattle, from North Seventy-fifth Street to North Eighty-fifth Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses, and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2154 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
